entry.title: RT Community Notes: We’re rolling out an update that better identifies notes that are broadly found not helpful. This boosts the average quality of n...
entry.summary: RT Community Notes We’re rolling out an update that better identifies notes that are broadly found not helpful. This boosts the average quality of notes contributors see and rate, making better use of their time and energy.

entry.title: RT SpaceX: After 30 days docked to the @space_station, the Dragon spacecraft supporting SpaceX’s 27th commercial resupply mission for @NASA will undo...
entry.summary: RT SpaceX After 30 days docked to the @space_station, the Dragon spacecraft supporting SpaceX’s 27th commercial resupply mission for @NASA will undock from the orbiting lab tomorrow at 11:05 a.m. ET. Watch live beginning at ~10:45 a.m. ET → http://nasa.gov/nasalive https://t.co/K5ZMZpU38U
